/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, forming a network of geometric patterns against the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with wispy clouds adding a touch of whimsy to the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid and bright, contributing to the overall lively atmosphere of the scene.
